import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Ver Reporte Financiero"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/customers/info/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Su propósito es obtener información detallada de un cliente incluyendo documentos emitidos, notas de venta, totales consumidos, pagos realizados y deuda pendiente.

***Ejemplo:***  
 - **Método:** GET
 - **URL:** https://empresa1.demo3pro6.ibu.pe/api/customers/info/55
 - **TOKEN:** HOHYgwd4atPalTxqi2IIspythpLAU7eP239oByfjk9VuveiOpfUTm4Yg0Szt

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
    className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary"}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Path Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"ID del cliente del cual obtener la información","schema":{"type":"integer","example":55}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details>

<div>
<ApiTabs>
<TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}>
<div>

Información del cliente obtenida exitosamente

</div>

<div>

<SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}>
<TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}>
<details style={{}} className="openapi-markdown__details response" data-collapsed={false}>

<strong>Schema</strong>
</summary>

<div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}>

<ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}>
<SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}>
<details style={{}}>
<summary style={{}}>
<strong>customer</strong>
<span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object</span>
</summary>
<div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}>
<div style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}>
Información básica del cliente
</div>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"ID del cliente","example":55}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Tipo de persona","example":"customers"}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"number"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Número de documento","example":"72346556"}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Nombre del cliente","example":"Pedro Diaz"}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"email"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Correo electrónico del cliente","example":"pedro@example.com"}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"telephone"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Teléfono del cliente","example":"954533737"}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"address"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Dirección del cliente","example":"Urb Sesquicentenario Vipol Callao"}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}>
<details style={{}}>
<summary style={{}}>
<strong>identity_document_type</strong>
<span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object</span>
</summary>
<div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}>
<div style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}>
Tipo de documento de identidad
</div>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"DNI"}}>
</SchemaItem>
</div>
</details>
</SchemaItem>
</div>
</details>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"documents_count"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Cantidad total de documentos del cliente (facturas, boletas y notas de venta)","example":15}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"total_consumed"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Total consumido por el cliente (formateado)","example":"1,250.50"}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"total_paid"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Total pagado por el cliente (formateado)","example":"1,000.00"}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"pending_debt"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Deuda pendiente del cliente (formateado)","example":"250.50"}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"documents"} required={false} schemaName={"object[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Lista de documentos del cliente (facturas y boletas)","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","example":123},"series":{"type":"string","example":"F001"},"number":{"type":"string","example":"00000001"},"date_of_issue":{"type":"string","format":"date","example":"2023-12-01"},"total":{"type":"number","format":"float","example":150.5},"document_type_id":{"type":"string","example":"01"}}}}}>
</SchemaItem>
<SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"sale_notes"} required={false} schemaName={"object[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Lista de notas de venta del cliente","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","example":456},"series":{"type":"string","example":"NV01"},"number":{"type":"string","example":"00000001"},"date_of_issue":{"type":"string","format":"date","example":"2023-12-01"},"total":{"type":"number","format":"float","example":75.25}}}}}>
</SchemaItem>
</ul>
</details>
</TabItem>
<TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}>
